description: Contributed to IT tasks within a quality team, focusing on data management, process efficiency, and supporting analytics through MeasureLink integration. Played a key role in automating data tracking with a QR code project, ensuring accuracy through data cleaning and facilitating training on analytics software and Excel proficiency.

Developed a "Cryptocurrency Portfolio Tracker" application that allows users to manage transactions with real-time price updates from an external API and utilizes PostgreSQL for efficient data storage. Implemented user authentication to secure access and enhanced the user experience by providing portfolio valuation and performance metrics for effective investment tracking. Gained knowledge in Django, Python, RESTful APIs, Postman, and Docker throughout the development process.

Acted as an intermediary between American clients and life insurance agents, facilitating effective communication while managing multiple inquiries and interactions. Utilized Slack and Excel for streamlined project management and data analysis, enhancing operational efficiency and honing teamwork skills.

Worked as a freelance contractor in website design and management, building and overseeing a WordPress site while creating engaging content. Developed skills in copywriting, web development, and user experience optimization to deliver high-quality digital solutions aligned with client objectives.

Managed the Instagram account @AyeCode.tv, successfully growing it to over 120,000 followers through strategic content scheduling and video editing. Leveraged client collaborations and engagement metrics to enhance visibility, refine strategies, and develop skills in social media marketing and content monetization.
